job_tasks.phrase: Generative AI module - module voor het resizen, in & outpainten van advertentie banners voor adverteerders via integratie met generative AI services
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the creation and integration of generative AI modules for specific tasks like image manipulation (resizing, in/outpainting).

job_tasks.phrase: Ontwikkelen sales/adops chatbot obv email database
job_tasks.justification: Developing a chatbot implies building and potentially fine-tuning a language model, aligning with generative AI tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Opzetten speech-to-text followed by text-to-text proces voor het classificeren van audio/video streams
job_tasks.justification: This describes the setup of a multi-stage process involving generative AI capabilities (speech-to-text, text-to-text for classification).

job_tasks.phrase: Creatie van advertising prospectie lijsten obv bestaande klantenoverzicht
job_tasks.justification: Creating lists based on existing data suggests the use of predictive or generative models for data enrichment and insight generation.

job_tasks.phrase: Creatie van een optimale media planning tool obv historische voorstellen
job_tasks.justification: Building a planning tool based on historical data implies model development for optimization and prediction.

job_tasks.phrase: Highlights en next best actions definiëren obv campagne rapportering
job_tasks.justification: Defining highlights and next best actions from reports involves analyzing data and potentially using models to identify patterns and recommend actions.

job_tasks.phrase: Vergelijken van verschillende externe gen AI services (text, image, audio, video) in functie van een objectief
job_tasks.justification: This task involves evaluating and comparing generative AI models and services, a core part of the modeling process.

job_tasks.phrase: Evalueren en opzetten van een RAG versus fine tuned LLM
job_tasks.justification: Directly mentions RAG and fine-tuning LLMs, which are core Generative AI modeling tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: je interageert met stakeholders om de scope goed uit te spitten en kritische vragen te stellen
job_tasks.justification: This involves understanding requirements and translating them into technical solutions, a key part of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: je bouwt reliable & robuuste interfaces voor andere DPG teams om mee te integreren
job_tasks.justification: Building robust interfaces for integration is a fundamental software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: je integreert generative AI APIs op kostenefficiënte en schaalbare wijze
job_tasks.justification: Integrating APIs and ensuring efficiency/scalability are software development responsibilities.

job_tasks.phrase: je bouwt snelle POCs om bepaalde externe tools te evalueren naar business value
job_tasks.justification: Building Proofs of Concept (POCs) for evaluating tools is a software development activity focused on rapid prototyping.

job_tasks.phrase: you build it, you run it mentaliteit (development & devops, infra-as-code, CICD, …)
job_tasks.justification: Explicitly mentions devops, infra-as-code, and CICD, which are core components of MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: je bent zelfstandig en kan zonder veel problemen een webapplicatie opzetten binnen een AWS omgeving
job_tasks.justification: Setting up web applications in a cloud environment (AWS) implies deployment and infrastructure management, aligning with operations.
This indicates an understanding of the specific business domain (digital advertising) for which solutions are being developed.
Focusing on 'business value' highlights the need to align technical solutions with business outcomes.

technologies.tool_name: generative AI services (text, image, audio, video)

soft_skills.phrase: je neemt deel aan standups, refinements, retro's & demo's
samen met de PO, project managers en stakeholders ontwikkel je generative AI POCs / modules
je interageert met stakeholders om de scope goed uit te spitten en kritische vragen te stellen
je bouwt snelle POCs om bepaalde externe tools te evalueren naar business value
je neemt ownership & accountability voor bepaalde applicaties / modules / processen / ..

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the design, development, and implementation of Generative AI modules, including RAG and fine-tuning LLMs. It also highlights building user-facing applications and integrating generative AI APIs, aligning perfectly with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.
